3.name: Narration
3.text:
The village is burning red. The raging flames of
the volcano are engulfing the houses, the
livestock is drowning in a sea of blood, and the
villagers are desperately fleeing.

4.name: Narration
4.text:
Not long ago, it should have been a peaceful,
gentle night. However, suddenly, the sound of
mighty wings flapping heralded disaster for the
village.

5.name: Narration
5.text:
The red dragon Evennajetoldoru enjoys destruction
and slaughter as it pleases. The sensation of
biting into fragile humans, and the taste of their
blood and flesh bursting in the mouth, is
exquisite. Especially when they were shedding
tears of fear until just before being devoured, it
becomes exceptional.

6.name: Narration
6.text:
The tail swinging easily knocks down the houses,
with every swipe of its claws, lives burst, and
its scorching breath turns everything around into
a sea of flames. Its crimson silhouette was truly
the embodiment of disaster.

8.name: Narration
8.text:
That day, the village was destroyed by the
capricious play of a single red dragon. It is said
that out of nearly 100 villagers, only three
survived.

13.name: Narration
13.text:
The massive body, which had been coiled up and
sleeping, raised its head. It recognized Sol and
wore a sadistic smile, as if saying, "You've
finally arrived."

14.name: Sol
14.text:
"For everyone's sake! And for my mother's revenge!
I will protect them!"

16.name: Narration
16.text:
The red dragon roars, causing the surroundings to
tremble in fear. However, they stand up to it.
Enduring the despair that eats away at their
hearts and the scorching heat burning their
bodies, the adventurers take up their weapons and
step forward.

17.name: Narration
17.text:
The golden little dragon mustered its courage and
dashed towards the gigantic shadow. That became
the signal for battle...!
